app_descript:
App Name: Good Craft 2
App Package Name: good-craft-2

Brief:
Dive into the voxel-based world of Good Craft 2, a sandbox adventure that promises to deliver a rich crafting experience filled with limitless possibilities. As a successor to its predecessor, Good Craft 2 offers an enhanced gaming experience with high-resolution textures and seamless gameplay even on devices with lower specifications. Get ready to unleash your creativity in world-building like never before!
